rows.label: bf06120100_0002
rows.name:
My apologies.
Did I keep you waiting?

rows.label: bf06120100_0004
rows.name: No, not really.

rows.label: bf06120100_0006
rows.name: What...were you doing?

rows.label: bf06120100_0008
rows.name: I was cleansing the Core Crystals.

rows.label: bf06120100_0010
rows.name: It markedly increases their resonance success rate.

rows.label: bf06120100_0012
rows.name:
Bonding with a Crystal carries
certain risks, you understand...

rows.label: bf06120100_0014
rows.name: I know.

rows.label: bf06120100_0016
rows.name:
When I became the Driver of an Holy Grail,
this power was awakened in me.

rows.label: bf06120100_0018
rows.name: ...So I might be able to do it too?

rows.label: bf06120100_0020
rows.name:
Who knows. Different people are
cut out for different things...

rows.label: bf06120100_0022
rows.name: Right, yeah.

rows.label: bf06120100_0024
rows.name: Now then. My work is done for the day.

rows.label: bf06120100_0026
rows.name: Come with me.

rows.label: bf06120100_0028
rows.name: A special envoy...to Luxuria? Me?

rows.label: bf06120100_0030
rows.name: Correct. Behold.

rows.label: bf06120100_0035
rows.name: As a salvager, I imagine you are already aware,

rows.label: bf06120100_0037
rows.name: But this is Alst, the world we currently inhabit.

rows.label: bf06120100_0040
rows.name:
We make our home on Divine Beasts,
moving in circles around the World Tree.

rows.label: bf06120100_0050
rows.name: And here lies the Great Void.

rows.label: bf06120100_0060
rows.name:
This Void came into being 500 years ago.
It did not exist prior to that.

rows.label: bf06120100_0070
rows.name:
So I've heard. It's in our way, anyway.
It stopped us reaching the World Tree.

rows.label: bf06120100_0080
rows.name:
The Great Void is being created by
a mounstrous beast known as Serpent.

rows.label: bf06120100_0090
rows.name: Wait, you mean...that thing...?
